overview: A cynical young man, Giorgos, who believes that in this life you need to steer clear of principles and attachments, clashes with his father, captain Manolis and abandons the management of the family’s shipyard. Determined to build his life again, he gets a job as a waiter in a large hotel and believes that he can also get rich by taking advantage of the sorrows and the loneliness of the wealthy.

production_companies.name: Afoi Roussopouloi-G. Lazaridis - D. Sarris - K. Psarras

title: A Man for All Jobs...
